DOC.brief_summary: The aim study adapt validate Spanish European Quality Questionnaire ( EuroQ2 ) evaluate family ' experience quality care critically ill die patient ICU .
DOC.brief_title: Spanish Adaptation Study Reliability European Quality Questionnaire ( EuroQ2 )
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study adapt validate Spanish-language version European Quality Questionnaire ( EuroQ2 ) . Using forward-backward translation methodology , translate EuroQ2 Spanish evaluate psychometric characteristic clinical sample 200 family member responsible make medical decision patient discharge ICU die ICU . Cronbach 's alpha value , confirmatory factor analysis ( CFA ) evaluate order know reliability , construct validity , convergent validity .
DOC.criteria: Family member patient admit ICU 48 hour . Family member responsible patient decision make ICU consent participate . Family member younger 18 year , Family member able read write Spanish
